answerText: Cosmic Microwave Background Radiation [10] This probe made the first observational maps of the CMB and resulted in a Nobel Prize for George Smoot and John Mather. Its successor was the WMAP satellite
heading: ACF Winter |2009 | UC Irvine and Michigan State A | 17 | Science | Other | College
subject: Science
question: Question: Answer the following about a phenomenon and its mapping.   [10] This phenomenon discovered in 1964 by Arno Penzias and Robert Wilson at Bell Labs, provided crucial evidence of the Big Bang.
